column5: I just came back from Wawa late last Sunday night from Medhurst Lake with Air Dale in Wawa.Joining me was my young son Brendan as well as Dave Maciulis the publisher of my magazine and his two young boys.The camp was really nice, fishing was great for insane numbers of mostly small walleye with a couple of bruisers thrown in the mix for good measure.We had campfires every night, shared a lot of laughs and the boys had a blast!If you'd like to see the detailed write up complete with a bunch of photos and video clips you can check it out here:http://www.canadafishingguide.net/me...y-fly-in-trip/Cheers, Mike
Thanks for another great report Mike , you certainly are living the dream !

Although I never need an outside stimulus to become fired up about fishing, your report fired me up about fishing. Note to forum members: I heard from Mike exactly 1 minute after he posted this report and he was leaving at 3:00 a.m., earlier today, on his next fishing venture. After posting his report all Mike had to do was pack, sleep fast and head out at 3:00 a.m. Hope he had help driving so he could figure out a way to sleep on the way.

Hi Mike Another super fun report. Was the Impulse minnow you used the "electric chicken" color??? Will try to get some before we leave on Aug 4th. The color looks good for the tannin colored water on Upper Goose. I probable won't have room for it in my tackle box but will get some anyway. Thanks Itsme
